articles.author: Phil Thomas
articles.title: Trump demands 'reparations' from China over Covid: 'They must pay' - The Independent
articles.description: Former president, who had an ambiguous relationship with Beijing while in office, says the Asian superpower must pay at least $10 trillion
articles.content:
Donald Trump has called for China to pay reparations to the United States for the damage done by Covid-19, which originated in the city of Wuhan.
